text:
Note: Offer valid only on Wed, Fri & Sat Medium Pan Signature & Supreme pizza. 

Pizza Hut is an American restaurant chain and international franchise, known for pizza and side dishes. 
Every Sunday Pizza hut India offers buy 1 get 1 free on Medium size pizza on online order or takeaway.
